thread.title: Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton take groceries home
thread.title_full: Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton take groceries home | Daily Mail Online

author: Sam Machado For Dailymail.com
title: Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton take groceries home
text:
Gwen Stefani and Black Shelton appear to be gearing up for Super Bowl Sunday.
The celebrity couple was spotted leaving Ralph's supermarket in Sherman Oaks, California where they bought a good haul of items for the big event this weekend.
The two appeared to be in great spirits as they walked with Gwen's son Apollo, two.
Grocery outing: Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton were spotted at Ralph's supermarket in Sherman Oaks, California on Friday purchasing three carts worth of items
The pop star donned a blue shirt with a sports jacket that had some fluffy fur around the collar.
She stayed in touch with her usual spunky style with a jean skirt and black tights.
Gwen added on a pair on tall brown boots as she held her child's hand in the parking lot.
Big weekend ahead: With the Super Bowl on Sunday, the couple bought some items that should keep them full for a while
Pick up a pretty printed tote like Gwen Stefani £1395 Christian Louboutin Panettone small spiked textured-leather tote
Sold out - click to shop current line
Buy now
Gwen Stefani stuck to her usual slightly grungy cool-girl style as she stepped out with her beau Blake Shelton to do a spot of food shopping.
The singer looked coolly casual in a denim skirt and calf-length Timberlands paired with a tee and fur trimmed bomber jacket. But it was all about the accessories for us with this look. That bag is one of a kind!
The Christian Louboutin Panettonne pick is pretty top handled tote that can be worn as a shoulder bag too with the help of the long strap. What's not to love about the fabulous bead and spike details? Sadly this piece is sold out, but it was super pricey anyway so maybe it's a good thing for our bank balances?
If you want to pick up a pretty printed pick then head to the line up of alternatives below. From V by Very to Etro, we've got all budgets covered.
* PRICES MAY NOT BE AS ADVERTISED ...NOW GET ONE LIKE IT £32 V by Very embroidered wing tote
Buy now
£719 Etro embroidered detail tote at Farfetch
Buy now
£235 Sensi Studio tribal maxi straw bag at Avenue32
Buy now
£855 Les Petits Jouers small beaded tote at Farfetch (now £684)
Buy now
Blake kept it casual in his black button-up shirt with jeans and a blue hat.
He pushed the cart in front of him that carried plenty of groceries, including some diet Dr. Pepper.
Gwen's son looked adorable in his green and white onesie with little monsters on his feet.
Enough food there? Gwen was seen in the parking lot as an employee helped her push another cart to the car
Heading back: The pop star walked with her two-year-old son Apollo as the groceries were about to be loaded
The couple got some cart pushing help from one of the employees at the grocery store who brought out another cart that carried even more purchases.
Gwen made her way through the lot where she looked natural with a small hint of makeup.
She had her platinum blonde hair tied back and carried a colorful purse along the way.
Strapping in: The Voice judge put her child in his car seat after the shopping trip
Casual vibes: Blake sported a button-up shirt with jeans and a hat on the store outing
Good stuff everywhere: The two stars made sure they had enough food to last at home
When the pair got to the car, Gwen picked up her son to strap him in his car seat.
Blake put some of the bags in the trunk as he was seen carrying a tote bag.
On their way home, it appears that the two are about to set off for one amazing Sunday as the Patriots take on the Falcons.
Blossoming romance: The couple started dating in 2015 and have been inseparable ever since
Spunky gal: The 47-year-old looked unique as usual in her blue jacket with a ripped jean skirt
Gwen is also a mom to two other sons: Kingston, 10, and Zuma, eight. She was previously married to Gavin Rossdale.
Blake was married to singer Miranda Lambert before they got divorced in 2015.
The two stars began their relationship when things began to blossom while working together on music competition The Voice as judges.
So happy together: The country icon thanked his girlfriend at the People's Choice Awards in Los Angeles last January
Blake won a People's Choice Award this year for Favorite Album and Favorite Male Country Artist where he referenced his girlfriend while giving his speech.
'Got a lot of people to thank. Thank the hottest date here tonight, Gwen Stefani, who's sitting right there!' the country star said.
The two have been dating since fall 2015.
